metadata.title: CVE-2017-12940 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
libunrar.a in UnRAR before 5.5.7 has an out-of-bounds read in the EncodeFileName::Decode call within the Archive::ReadHeader15 function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12940` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunrar-headers - 1:5.5.8-1
libunrar5 - 1:5.5.8-1
unrar - 1:5.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.5.8-1').
